About Chesapeake Urology

Chesapeake Urology is the largest urology practice in Maryland and the Mid-Atlantic Region. Our urologists deliver the most innovative and compassionate urology care available. Composed of 54 of the mid-Atlantic region's top urologists, including many who are fellowship trained, four radiation oncologists, a pediatric urologist, and a urologic pathologist, Chesapeake Urology provides the convenience of 21 urology centers and 15 surgical centers throughout the greater Baltimore, Maryland area. Our experienced, board-certified urologists use advanced treatments to manage all types of urological problems for adults and children, including the da Vinci Robotic Surgical System and many other laparoscopic and minimally invasive urological procedures.

Chesapeake Urology News

Stay on top of the latest news from Chesapeake Urology!

From the expansion of urology services throughout the region to renowned urologists and specialists joining our team to provide patients with the most superior patient experience, stay up-to-date with the latest breaking news from the area's largest and leading urology practice.

Chesapeake Urology in the Community

One of Chesapeake Urology's core value is to support and give back to our community. We take our work with the community to heart and work hard to support the community in several ways: Through prostate cancer programs including free screenings and funding for key research; through educational programs including scholarships, partnerships with area schools and community education seminars; and through employee engagement programs which involves Chesapeake Urology staff in giving back to our community. Chesapeake Urology is also proud to support ZERO:The Project to End Prostate Cancer, which has raised more than $2 million nationally to support prostate cancer programs and research. We invite you to see what Chesapeake Urology in the Community has to offer...

Patient
Navigator

At Chesapeake Urology, an experienced nurse practitioner will support you every step of the way. From helping you weigh the pros and cons of treatment options, to coordinating appointments and survivorship care, you'll get the personalized guidance you need.

Meet your patient navigator.
